what are we doing well? prompts for thin:
Open communication and asking users for input before making decisions that might impact the system.
Very helpful and friendly community of pro-users that help even for very niche questions.
Looking forward to MultiWiki becoming mature so I can combine my numerous Node instances.
what could we do better? prompts for thi:
More documentation in regards to interacting with TW via JS. Creating custom JS macros involves a lot of trial and error until the correct method is found and which parameters to pass in.

Documentation for some filter operators is confusing (i.e. jsonextract vs jsonget).

Also overall support for JSON could be improved so plugins do not need to rely on field names which causes collisions. Proposition: a parsejson operator
with your consent, we would like to publ: Yes, I am happy for my responses to be published
